name: Custom Google Ajax Rss Feed
author: Anurag Jain

sections.description:
Google Ajax Feed is for display google ajax rss feed vertically or horizontally.
Currently this has basic functionality. Here After activate from admin panel admin can set this widget in any sidebar and then he has to fill google api key and site url for rss feeds. Admin can set display of feeds horizontally or vertically. and also can set number of feeds to display.
sections.installation:
1. Install the WordPress plugin.

    Option 1: Go to your WordPress plugin Panel click “Add New” search for “Google Ajax Rss feed”. Click on the Install link on the far right under Actions. Cick the install button on the plugin page.

    Option 2: Download it here. Go to plugins in your WordPress admin panel and click “Add New” select upload and browse for the plugin you just downloaded click “Install Now” to install the plugin.

  2. Activate the plugin in your WordPress Admin panel under plugins

  3. Once the plugin is activated you should see a widget in the widget section of the Appearance secion of your Admin Panel.
    Just drag and drop that in to your side bar and you are ready to go. If you do not have a side bar then the plugin will automaticly include the client code. You have to add google api key and site url for feed.

  4. Check setup.
sections.faq:
What if I do not like this plugin how can I disable it?

You can deactivate it in your WordPress Admin plugin Section

short_description: This plugin is designed to integrate a WordPress site with google ajax rss feeds.
description:
Google Ajax Feed is for display google ajax rss feed vertically or horizontally.
Currently this has basic functionality. Here After activate from admin panel admin can set this widget in any sidebar and then he has to fill google api key and site url for rss feeds. Admin can set display of feeds horizontally or vertically. and also can set number of feeds to display.
